AggLimitCalcArguments.title: AggLimitCalc
AggLimitCalcArguments.description: Arguments for the AggLimitCalc batch process

rebuildAll.title: Rebuild all
rebuildAll.description: Flag indicating whether all aggregate limits should be rebuilt. If false or not specified, only invalid aggregate limits are rebuilt.

agglimitcalc.title: AggLimitCalc
agglimitcalc.description: Arguments for the AggLimitCalc batch process

financialscalc.title: FinancialsCalc
financialscalc.description: Arguments for the FinancialsCalc batch process

FinancialsCalcArguments.title: FinancialsCalc
FinancialsCalcArguments.description: Arguments for the FinancialsCalc batch process

claimNumbers.title: Claim numbers
claimNumbers.description: List of claims whose rpt tables should be recalculated. If not specified, all rpt tables are recalculated.
